articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google, sorry, but that Pixel event was a cringefest - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's Pixel event was awkward and forced, underselling the technology it had on display.
articles.content: “I P 6 8! I P 6 8!,” shouted late-night host Jimmy Fallon, trying and failing to fake excitement about the new Pixel smartphones. Fallon, who likely had never heard the technical term before, didn’t … [+6098 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Having recovery and/or SSD problems after recent Windows updates? You’re not alone. - Ars Technica
articles.description: Recovery issue is already resolved; SSD problems have been trickier to diagnose.
